Reviews.Title: Good cell phone
Reviews.Author: Brad Porter
Reviews.Content: This cell phone works pretty well. I can add minutes to my phone from the phone itself, which is good. It's pretty easy to use. I may have to get use to it, though I was sent a 320g instead of the one in the picture. But it's nice to have.

ProductInfo.Features:
NET10 FACTORY REFURBISHED!
1 YEAR NET10 FACTORY LIMITED WARRANTY!
Package includes: LG 300g NET10 (Black color), LG Battery, LG Battery Door, LG Home Charger, NET10 Activation Card and NET10 User Guide
Uses AT&T; and T-Mobile Towers for best service
ProductInfo.Name: LG 300g NET10 Feature Prepaid Color Cell Phone
